definition: Putonghua Proficiency Test, an official test of spoken fluency in Standard Chinese for native speakers of Chinese languages, developed in the PRC in 1994
pinyin: Pu3 tong1 hua4 Shui3 ping2 Ce4 shi4

definition: American Society for Testing and Materials (ASTM)
pinyin: Ce4 shi4 he2 Cai2 liao4 Xie2 hui4

sentences.english: This will be a document that you give to a tester.
sentences.chinese: 這樣就會形成你給測試者的一個文件。

sentences.english: So I decided to test the system.
sentences.chinese: 因此我決定測試下這個制度。

sentences.english: Deciding microwave anechoic chamber dimensions in terms of measurement project and EUT(equipment under test) dimensions.
sentences.chinese: 根據測試項目和被測件的大小，決定暗室的尺寸。

sentences.english: So watch out for these tests because they happen all the time。
sentences.chinese: 所以，要當心這些測試，因爲它們無時不在。

sentences.english: It provides the opportunity to test unrelated applications running together.
sentences.chinese: 它提供了測試一起運行的無關應用程序的機會。

sentences.english: Test, tweak, rinse and repeat until you succeed.
sentences.chinese: 在你成功之前，測試，調節，清理和重做。

sentences.english: The testing of FL has witnessed two periods of development: that of code-based testing first and then that of structure-based testing.
sentences.chinese: 外語測試經歷了以語碼爲綱和以結構爲綱的兩個時期。

sentences.english: The new rocket was extensively tested and debugged by the army.
sentences.chinese: 這種新式火箭由軍方進行了廣泛的測試和調試。

sentences.english: Scientists conducted genetic tests on thousands of maize seed and leaf samples.
sentences.chinese: 科學家對數千份千玉米種子和葉的樣本進行遺傳測試。

sentences.english: At 16 weeks, I was offered an amniocentesis test.
sentences.chinese: 16個星期的時候，我做了羊水穿刺測試。

sentences.english: He says the new facility may make future tests more realistic.
sentences.chinese: 他說，新的設施可能使未來的測試變得更現實。

sentences.english: If you have doubts, have it tested and/or get a Brita filter pitcher.
sentences.chinese: 如果你還擔心，測試下水質，或者買個純淨水過濾器。

sentences.english: With any given project there are stages of development and test.
sentences.chinese: 在任何給定的項目中，都有不同的開發和測試階段。

sentences.english: Yes, testing is expensive, but production outages can be more so.
sentences.chinese: 是的，測試費用相當高昂，但生產損耗可能會更大。

sentences.english: In most cases the interviewer will give you feedback on the test.
sentences.chinese: 在大多數情況下，該面試官會給你測試反饋信息。

sentences.english: It's not tested yet, so I can't check in to the trunk.
sentences.chinese: 還沒有測試過呢，所以不能檢入到主幹中。

definition: to inspect and verify/experimental verification/to validate (a theory)/to authenticate
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
investigation/inquiry/to investigate/to survey/survey/(opinion) poll/CL:項|项[xiang4],個|个[ge4]
to target/to focus on/to be aimed at or against/in response to
